 |________________ .---------------.
  ________________ | R e l e a s e | I n f o r m a t i o n . .
 |                 `----------------------------- -
 |
 |  Me and PostApocalypse 2: Scraping - this first person shooter with elements
 |  of survival and adventure games for Windows/Linux. This sequel to the game
 |  Me and PostApocalypse, you experiment scientist - the man, who defies infection
 |  plague that has enslaved the people of the Earth, making them zombies. You have
 |  to destroy the droid, which took the Earth, and to free the planet from the
 |  zombies that the Earth is back again. You expect a lot of adventures - passing
 |  through the heat and cold, having survived the night, fighting off attacks droids
 |  and zombies, to save the planet from destruction.
 |
 |
 | * Support Indie Game Developers and dont be a Dick! If you like it, buy it!
 |
 |________________ .---------------.
  ________________ | I n s t a l l | I n f o r m a t i o n . .
 |                 `----------------------------- -
 |
 | 1.> Burn .iso to CD/DVD or mount using Daemon Tools.
 | 2.> Install.
 | 3.> Play Game.
 | 4.> Play Game Again.
 |
